vg247.com/2015/04/play-skyrim-for-free-t.title: Play Skyrim for free this weekend on Steam and take 75% off while...
vg247.com/2015/04/play-skyrim-for-free-t.snippet: Head over to Steam and download the game and play for free until April 26 at 1am PDT. The game is also 75% off if you decide you like it enough and the Legendary Edition is also on sale for 66% off. All DLC is also on sale.
